Document.Focus: Urinary tract infection in girls - aftercare

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Urinary tract infection in girls - aftercare ?
QAPair.Answer: Your child had a urinary tract infection and was treated by a health care provider. This article tells you how to take care of your child after she has been seen by a provider.

QAPair.Question: How to prevent Urinary tract infection in girls - aftercare ?
